name: Apart Schrofen
description:
Our house is situated in a quiet, yet central position at the forest edge, only a 10/15 minutes walk from town. In winter the Mayrhofen ski area "Ski-Zillertal3000" is easily accessible with the ski bus which runs just 40m from the front door!

Suitable for up to 7 guests comprising of 2 fully equipped apartments and a further double bedroom with en-suite. Set in a convenient location just 10 minutes walk, 1km, from the centre of Mayrhofen with its numerous bars and restaurants. Each apartment benefits from its own open plan kitchen and dining/seating area, en-suite bedroom and a south facing balcony or terrace.

Set in the heart of Zillertal, with stunning mountain views, you are conveniently situated for all of the activities available in the region including year round skiing on the glacier. In the winter season the Ski Bus stops just 40m from the front door giving easy access to the whole Ski-Zillertal 3000 region.

We would like to take this opportunity to welcome you to our luxury apartments in the heart of this beautiful area of Austria. 

The apartments will comfortably accommodate 2-7 persons and are 70m² in all with off road parking directly outside the door. 

The apartments are fitted out to a high standard.

What you can expect in our lovely very private and child friendly apartments;

Premium bedding
Premium towels
Laundry and ironing facilities are available
Fully equipped kitchen including dishwasher
Cable TV
Wi-fi
Room safe
Separate, private, Ski storage and boot drying
Secure bike storage
Remote, keyless entry


Choices of rental options are;

Sleeps 2 - Double bedroom with double bed and en-suite.
Sleeps 3 - Triple bedroom with double bed and a single bed and en-suite
Sleeps 4 - 2 double bedrooms with double beds both with en-suite
Sleeps 5 - Triple bedroom with double bed and a single bed with en-suite plus a further double bedroom with double bed and en-suite
Sleeps 7 - 2 double bedrooms with double beds and separate en-suites and a triple bedroom with double and a single bed with en-suite
 
And finally …….
 
We want you to enjoy your holiday and to make sure we have given you all the accurate information you need. If you think we have missed anything or something should be included that would be helpful then please let us know and we will make sure it is included for the convenience our other guests. Looking forward to meeting you :)

Included in price: electricity, water.
Excluded: a final cleaning charge
Check in: 2pm/Check out: 9.30am

Take the motorway exit Zillertal, drive down the federal highway B169 to Mayrhofen, after the roundabout traffic take the first departure on the right (directly before the railway station), then cross the bridge after 800 m/ the second entrance on the left.
